scripts.serve: npm run emulators:kill && npm run env:java -- npx firebase-tools emulators:start --only functions,firestore --config ../../firebase.json --project pletcher-portfolio-app
scripts.serve:seeded: npm run emulators:kill && echo "Importing Firestore from: ../.databases/imports/firestore/latest" && npm run env:java -- npx firebase-tools emulators:start --only functions,firestore --config ../../firebase.json --project pletcher-portfolio-app --import ../.databases/imports/firestore/latest
scripts.serve:aio: npm run seed:from-prod && npm run serve:seeded
scripts.deploy:functions: npm run env:java -- npx firebase-tools deploy --only functions --config ../../firebase.json
scripts.logs:functions: npm run env:java -- npx firebase-tools functions:log --config ../../firebase.json
